trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> event that is raised by visual design tools, such as Visual Studio 2005, implementing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> 事件的方法，该事件由实现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> 接口的可视化设计工具（例如 Visual Studio 2005）引发。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>设计图面上的控件上的某些操作的设计器宿主通过引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>事件由处理<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委托方法，后者采用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>对象作为参数。

trans-unit.source: Typically, control designer classes do not directly implement or assign a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，控件设计器类不直接实现或分配<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委托。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class supplies a default delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.

Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 自定义控件设计器重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>方法，以处理这些事件设计图面上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method sets the default event delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法设置的默认事件委托<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>委托。
